title: Chicken and bacon tortilla wraps
ingredients: ['3 chicken breast fillets', '6 slices bacon', '3 medium onions', '2 tablespoons paprika', '1 tablespoon garlic powder', '1 tablespoon chilli flakes', '1 tablespoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '1 teaspoon ground aniseseed (optional).', '1 teaspoon cracked black pepper', '1 packet mixed salad leaves', '1 tablespoon butter and oil for frying', '50ml water', '8 tortilla wraps', 'mayonnaise, to serve']
